labels.analysis: The NinjaProxy MCP Server is designed to manage and access static proxy IPs provided by NinjaProxy. Its core functionality revolves around retrieving and utilizing proxy information for HTTP requests. The available tools allow users to set an API key, fetch their assigned proxies, retrieve specific proxies by index, and generate ready-to-use proxy configurations. This server simplifies the integration of proxies into applications by automating the retrieval and formatting of proxy details.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Network & Proxy Management" is chosen because the server's main purpose is to handle static proxy IPs and their configurations, which falls under network management. The secondary labels "API Integration" and "Development Tools" are selected because the server interacts with an API for proxy management and is useful for developers integrating proxies into applications. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: NinjaProxy MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @ninjasproxy/ninjaproxy-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Manage and access your static proxy IPs from NinjaProxy. Retrieve your proxy IPs, get specific proxies by index, and obtain ready-to-use proxy configurations for HTTP requests. Simplify proxy management and integration for your applications.

tools.name: set_api_key
tools.description: Deploy Server NinjaProxy MCP Server @ninjasproxy/ninjaproxy-mcp-server Try in Playground set_api_key

tools.name: get_my_proxies
tools.description: Get your assigned static proxy IPs

tools.name: get_proxy_by_index
tools.description: Get a specific proxy from your list by index (0-based)

tools.name: get_proxy_config
tools.description: Get proxy configuration for making HTTP requests

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@ninjasproxy/ninjaproxy-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: NINJAPROXY_API_KEY
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Your NinjaProxy API key from ninjaproxy.com
